metadata.name: Salt
metadata.description:
Salt and Mountain under magnificent skies.

September 2019 I was awarded the opportunity to live in Iceland for one month as an Artist in Residence at a small working farmhouse in the remote Westfjords. I spent my time photographing the land and the family's winter Shepherding and Mussel processing operations. Salt is the first image introducing the larger body of work Geothermal Island, GEOIS, and is part of the traveling exhibition Westfjords Wandering.

Location:  
Handverksf√©lagid Aassa, Westfjords, Iceland

Date of Capture: Sept 16, 2019
